thread.title: Brady takes shot at Roger Goodell in pre-recorded commercial
thread.title_full: Brady takes shot at Roger Goodell in pre-recorded commercial

author: NICHOLAS PARCO
title: Brady takes shot at Roger Goodell in pre-recorded commercial
text:
43 AM 
Tom Brady might’ve had more faith in the Patriots than anyone. 
In a pre-recorded commercial that aired shortly after New England took the Falcons to overtime and won Super Bowl LI, Brady is seen not only wearing five Super Bowl rings, but getting sweet redemption at NFL commissioner Roger Goodell as well. 
Tom Brady for Shields MRI. 5 Rings #Rogerthat from Shields Health Care on Vimeo . 
Sitting in a waiting room for Shields MRI, a Massachusettes health care group, Brady name is called and he is asked to remove all of his jewelry. 
He takes off four rings from his fingers but reaching deep into his pocket to reveal a fifth one -- from Super Bowl LI. 
The icing on the cake is Brady’s final line when the Shields employee jokes that they need a bigger locker for his rings: “Roger that!” Tags:
